lenders.name: Joselyn
lenders.loan_because: I want to make as much difference in other peoples lives as I can. When it takes so little to help, why not....
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Psychology Professor and LPC-I

lenders.name: Sheryl, Bob & Tucker
lenders.loan_because: We're particularly blessed in this life!

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others improve their life
lenders.occupational_info: I like my work. I work in an office and I am very good at it. I do the financial part in the calculation and payment of periodical benefits for victims of the second world war. I find it important to support myself financially.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: I hope that whatever small gestures I can make will enable someone else to realize her (or his) dreams.  I hope this will enhance someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: In my work, I try to help other people to overcome obstacles.  I try to support people so that they will have the courage to keep going.  I try to help people who are struggling to live a little bit easier.  I try to help people see that someone cares about them.

lenders.name: Fiber Optic Cable Shop
lenders.loan_because: We would love to be there to help these individuals personally, but since that is impractical, Kiva is an outstanding alternative.
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacturer and distribute fiber optic products for data communications.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: A small gesture on my part  can make a huge difference to someone else.  Pay it forward!

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that the faculty and staff in my department have computer equipment that is up to date and working.  I work at a University and support two departments.  The Germanic and Slavic Studies department offers courses in German and Russian.  The Comparative Literature Department houses a variety of languages including Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and Swahili.

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: I've always had people in my life to help me if i needed it.  Now i want to give back.

lenders.name: Jean Francois
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I strongly believe that helping people become independent and self sufficient is crucial to alleviating both hunger and poverty.  It also promotes, confidence and a thirst for knowledge.

lenders.name: Patrick - Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in a life every day.
lenders.occupational_info: Project manager.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lenders.name: Gina
lenders.loan_because: With small tokens of generosity and faith, we can impact the world in a monumental way.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to make a difference in other people's lives.  Staying at home with three kids under age 4 doesn't provide a lot of opportunites to do so.  I read about Kiva in a Parents magazine and couldn't wait to check it out.

lenders.name: Aileen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help and connect with others.  We have so much even when we struggle it is nothing compared to these people.  They are smart and hard workers and just need some help.
lenders.occupational_info: I review medical procedures that need to be done to make sure they are medically necessary. I approved medical equipment and therapy also

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: although I am far from wealthy I can help someone who can do so much with what seems a small amount from me but can really impact their life so much
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the front reception desk of an International Wire & Cable company, I am the first person seen by vendors and visitors. It is my job to get them to the right person as smoothly and pleasantly as possible.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people across the world achieve their goals and to be to be self-sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info:
I live in Canada with my husband and 9 month old baby girl.  I speak English, Spanish and French.  In my spare time I volunteer with a local charity that helps African refugees from war torn countries settle in Canada.  I would like to dedicate more of my time and efforts to help those in need around the world. 

Je suis Canadienne et j'habite  
en Vancouver.  Je veux aider les femmes autours du monde avec leurs reves.

Soy Canadiense y quiero ayudar a las mujeres del mundo con sus metas para que pueden mantener a sus familias y tener la confianza de hacer algo con si misma.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: As someone once said, "While we do not live by bread alone, we don't live long without it."  The Kiva program is a good way to help others help themselves and express solidarity with our neighbors around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: As a minister it is my privilege to help others grow in faith, hope, and love.  I have often been inspired in my own faith journey by others near and far.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of two boys under 3...its hard, demanding and 24-7.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: making a better world starts with yourself
lenders.occupational_info: Owner of a cleaningcompany for specialized cleaning. I knows by experience how hard it can be starting your own business.

lenders.name: Heloise
lenders.loan_because: I want to empower people to start or expand a viable business in order to earn their  living and serve their neighbors.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the oil and gas exploration and production industry, as a geophysicist. I examine seismic reflection field data in order to learn of structure, stratigraphy, fractures, and in situ stress at depth in the rocks.  Renewable energy (solar, wind, wave) are better sources of energy than fossil fuels, and I seek to shift my life off hydrocarbons and onto renewable energy !

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I like to see (especially) women empowered to do well in business. We have it so good in America, but everyone deserves a chance to thrive and become sucessful.
lenders.occupational_info: Writing and editing in the law field.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: It's amazing how much we have, when compared to people who have so little and request so little. How can we not help?
lenders.occupational_info: We manufacture windshield repair equipment to people all over the world, helping them get started in business.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I feel priviledged to be able to help other people around the world trying to make a better life for themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: I manage workers compensation claims for an insurance company in Phoenix

lenders.name: Johna
lenders.loan_because: God wants me to.
lenders.occupational_info: We build shopping centers and also apartments to live in.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: we have a small business & want to help support others & gain independence!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a sales mgr at a local retail store & my husband is a small business owner/self employee in construction & estimating.

lenders.name: Simone
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful way to support people in need with the necessary initiative to build a business

lenders.name: Ron and Laura
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people become self-sufficient and advance their economic status. We have been fortunate and have been blessed with a good life for which we are very thankful. We'd like to do our part in helping others achieve their hopes and dreams. Our grandson John Henry,  age 10, has also started donating some of his money to Kiva- to people in need. He says he really doesn't need the money and he'd like to help people who really do need it.

lenders.name: Mary and Victor
lenders.loan_because: We care what happens to our world and all  the people that  live in it.  We are proud grandparents of 9 beautiful grandchildren and we hope to show them by example that sharing and giving can be a very rewarding and enriching experience.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a very happy retired couple that have been together for 36 years.  We stay involved and active in protecting our world and keeping our imprint light.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to have someone help me when I started out.  It's pay back time.
lenders.occupational_info: Hands on holistic health care.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help each other regardless of what part of the world we live in.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a medical helicopter that helps transport sick and injured people to hospitals.

lenders.name: Dylan
lenders.occupational_info: I'm still in high school so I go to school and study all day.

lenders.name: Vistnes family
lenders.loan_because: God had blessed us with more than we need!!

lenders.name: Zac
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is a brilliant way to empower those who may not otherwise have had the means to achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I help managers in the hiring of workers.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone who is working hard to improve her life.  It is a loan, not a "handout," and enables people keep their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I used to tutor children who were to ill to go to school. Working with people who try to better themselves, against all odds, is very rewarding.  Women in emerging nations have difficult hurdles as they enter the business world, so my focus is on lending to them.

lenders.name: Erika H
lenders.loan_because: I want to create a beautiful world for my children and children everywhere.  I love the fact that I can give to a mother across the planet and help her create a better life for her family.
lenders.occupational_info: Mother, lover of life, nursing student, life student!

lenders.name: Sonny
lenders.loan_because: Everyone has a moral duty to help a fellow human being.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses find the best way to connect to their customers

lenders.name: Glenn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to start their own businesses, with the hope that they in turn will give aid to others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home builder in the suburbs north of Chicago, Illinois USA. I build homes for sale and for clients.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others and that in my role as a teacher it is vitally important not just to talk about giving but also be an example of giving.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: It's an amazing feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a construction and industrial supply company.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: A small loan can make a big difference.

lenders.name: Karoline
lenders.loan_because:
"I am only one, but I am one. I cannot do everything, but I can do something. And I will not let what I cannot do interfere with what I can do. " - Edward Everett Hale

I want to make a difference, and I think microfinance is a wonderful way to give individuals the opportunity to develop their full potential and take charge of their own destinies.
lenders.occupational_info:
Some keywords to describe me and my life: Karoline. Female. 24. Norway. Jesus. Travelling. Concerts. Literature. Global health. Africa. Children. Iced coffee. Music. Movies. Clouds. History. Scarves. Languages. Fulham FC. Nepal. Maternal and Child Health. Volunteering. Animals. Cello. Life. Faith. Hope. Love.

Received my BA in Development Studies from University of Oslo in June 2012. I've lived in the US, studied in London (SOAS) and India, volunteered in Ghana and done field work in Botswana. Last year I interned for six months at the Royal Norwegian Embassy in Kathmandu, Nepal then interned for three months at UNFPA Geneva.

Currently studying MSc Demography and Health at London School of Hygiene and Tropical Medicine.

I just can't see myself doing anything else than help other people unlock the incredible volumes of human capital in this world.

lenders.name: Amira
lenders.loan_because: Such a small amount makes a huge difference and to help out an entrepreneur in developing countries is the least I can do. It makes me happy to help anyone in need.Been loaning since 2007 :o)
lenders.occupational_info: My company plans events. The majority of our clients are weddings. We also do non-profit and charity events.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping less fortunate people
lenders.occupational_info: buy older cars, fix up and repair and sell them

lenders.name: Tina & Kim
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is one way that we can 'act globally" and because it might help make someone's life a little better...

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: I want God's people to experience the power of his love and grace.
lenders.occupational_info: God has blessed me with an opportunity to work in a small school community with underprivileged and minority children.  I primarily teach them writing and math skills. However, I hope my students gain a confidence and motivation that encourages them to reach for the stars and achieve their dreams!

lenders.name: Luke
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference!

lenders.name: Lana
lenders.loan_because: "What we do for ourselves dies with us.  What we do for others and the world remains and is immortal." - Albert Pine

lenders.name: Zach & Jill
lenders.loan_because: We love to travel and everywhere we visit we see the entrepreneurial spirit alive in locals who want to make a difference for their families & community, but often the resources aren't available to get their ideas off the ground.

lenders.name: Bunny
lenders.loan_because: I believe individual people can make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and journalist for magazines. I would like to write about micro loans and the people who have benefited from them.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: the governments of the developed world have failed to adequately redistribute the wealth they have accumulated.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at a university studying the effects of global warming.  Specifically, I am studying a subarctic wetland ecosystem.

lenders.name: V. Kate
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed with the resources to do so.

lenders.name: Jason&Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps!

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: everyone has something to give.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: I am very grateful for the quality of my life and I am inspired to support someone who wants  to put forth an effort to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired, working to build an organic health and healing community in western Oregon, living by example. I am working a community garden plot and live in a condo. Life is fantastic. Peace to you all.

lenders.name: Miche
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone who has a dream, deserves the chance to achieve it.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: This is a good and easy way to give directly to people who are trying to improve their lives. It's just good karma.

lenders.name: Lance
lenders.loan_because: I want to help any way I can.

lenders.name: Sai and Aarthi
lenders.loan_because: We believe in teaching a man how to fish than give him a fish

lenders.name: Karla
lenders.loan_because: I want to give women the ability to support themselves and their families through their small business activities.  Women around the world experience great difficulty accessing funds to start and expand small businesses; this is one small way I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a married mother of a sweet little girl named Heidi.  I am an elected councilor on my local municipal government.  My job is helping university students improve their study skills.

lenders.name: Tom & Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: It's a great idea!

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help the working poor improve their lives around the world, not just locally.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to see by making lenses for eyewear.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do to help make this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I strive for cleaner and more efficient energy consumption and production through technology transfer and design / process / operation optimization.

lenders.name: Marnie
lenders.loan_because: I feel I live in the most wonderful country in the world and I want to help others have the opportunities that I have had for good work.
lenders.occupational_info: Everything that is built needs to be drawn first for the builder or machinist. I make drawings on a computer for builders and machinists.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: it can change peoples' lives for the better. Plus, this website makes it pretty easy.

lenders.name: John & Katherine
lenders.loan_because: This loan is on behalf of the Richmond (Mass.) Congregational Church, which distributed "talents" to be used.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Nita
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: I sell paper and make books for people to put their family memories into.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do, to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I do research in mathematics and theoretical computer science

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I'm a loaner at heart.
lenders.occupational_info: Walking by Faith, Working by Faith, Living by Faith, Giving in Faith.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: for a long time I have talked about wanting to help but have never really known how. This is so tangible and personal and I love the idea!
lenders.occupational_info: I study nuclear medicine - it sounds more complicated than it really is :)

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.occupational_info: I design and improve websites, making them functional and easy to find at the same time.  I also help people start their own businesses in reselling telecommunications services.

lenders.name: Loretta
lenders.loan_because: I desire to help positively change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make sick people better.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: this is one of the the best things I can for the world do on the budget of a grad student.

lenders.name: Jobie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give someone a chance.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great opportunity to help others attain their dreams.  For many this is a way out of poverty.  I think it is important to give back whether it be this way or some other form of giving.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help motivated people

lenders.name: Tommie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make someone's life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: "The time is always right to do what is right." -- Martin Luther King, Jr.

lenders.name: Kate and Rick
lenders.loan_because:
My wife Kate passed away in 2010 from Pancreatic Cancer. 
I am continuing her legacy of giving via this lending program. We both want to encourage small businesses around the world.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Dadico Investments
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing a hand up instead of a handout and helping those eager to help themselves is a responsibility of us all.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a professional real estate investor dedicated to providing safe, clean homes for great tenants. Currently we concentrate on student rentals

We acquire properties by working with individuals who are looking to safely invest in real estate providing solid returns.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I think we are all put on this earth to serve others and especially those in the greatest need.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a public school district as a 
Food Service Director. I am in charge of 10 schools and feeding over 4000 students a healthy lunch each day. I love my work and the school community.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others an opportunity to live the comfortable life I'm currently living.

lenders.name: C&P
lenders.loan_because: we are the lucky ones.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves makes all kinds of sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I write mystery novels under the name "Deborah Donnelly."

lenders.name: Speakers' Spotlight
lenders.loan_because: I believe it can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: We are an agency representing speakers who provide educational, inspiring and entertaining speeches at conferences, meetings and special events.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism works. Helping the disadvantaged to help themselves benefits the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Jet engine design, analysis and testing

lenders.name: H Lynn Watson
lenders.loan_because:
"Of those to whom much is given, much is required"  - JFK

Sharing abundance is a blessing in itself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an HIV testing counselor volunteer, and Manage a Salon and Spa

lenders.name: Alain Desouches
lenders.loan_because: I like the possibility of loaning directly to women entrepreneurs based on their projects, and knowing that my small contribution pulls them toward a more satisfying life.
lenders.occupational_info: Now that I am retired, my most important work is to bring forth an environmentally sustainable, spiritually fulfilling and socially just human presence on this planet.

lenders.name: Mary Ann
lenders.loan_because: We can't just live our lives and not think of anyone else.  We all should be helping other people in any way we can.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a reason not to.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I am not wealthy by US standards but still have so much more than most of the world.  It feels good to help.

lenders.name: Audrey
lenders.loan_because: I'm selfish.  Giving makes me feel good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an administrative assistant for a local non-profit.  I handle all the general office work and day-to-day tasks that keep the Association running, in addition to being the unofficial Volunteer Coordinator.

lenders.name: Vilma
lenders.loan_because: I feel that this is a way to thank God for everything that I have and everything that has been taken away from me that I didn't need.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of a blind person.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: being a woman is not easy and being a woman in business is even harder so if I can make it easier for one woman to make her dreams come true in business I will.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have a heating and air conditioning business.  We also do geo thermla heating and cooling which use the ground, air or water as a source of heating and cooling with no green house gas emissions.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: It's such a simple and effective way to make a difference to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital to help people recover from illness or surgery

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to know I'm helping someone.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be independent
lenders.occupational_info: Bringing world peace through world trade.

lenders.name: Dexter
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I learned about Kiva from one of Oprah's shows.  I thought it was a wonderful way of having a positive impact on someone's life less fortunate than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am on operating room nurse in a busy outpatient surgery facility.  I specialize in the field of retinal surgery.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: I can. I don't have much, but it's enough.

lenders.name: Kurt
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Lee Kyle
lenders.occupation: Sales Manager - Cable TV, Internet and Phone
lenders.loan_because: I am very blessed and want to share my good fortune.  Giving back is important to me.

lenders.name: Edward & Waltraud
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those who have a sincere desire to better living conditions for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Jeff and Trina
lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance!
lenders.occupational_info: General Contractor of Custom Homes and Developer of property.

lenders.name: Ashleigh
lenders.loan_because: "No one has ever become poor from giving" - Anne Frank

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO GIVE PEOPLE A CHANCE TO BETTER THEIR LIVES.
lenders.occupational_info: I'M INVOLVE IN THE MAINTENANCE AND IMPROVEMENT OF  COMMERCIAL BUILDINGS

lenders.name: Geraldine
lenders.loan_because: I Love To Help People Anyway I Can!
lenders.occupational_info:
I Drive a School Bus :)
I Love Children!! ;)

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: I saw this on Oprah and thought it was a great way to help people, especially when they can start a business. This must be a great feeling for the families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a plumbing business, I price the work done, invoice, answer the phone,(when it is winter everyones furnace quits!) I also do payroll and pay bills.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I want to share my good fortune with other people.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint pictures of the beautiful land in the area where I live.  I also design electronics for Keyspan. You can see their products at  www.Keyspan.com.

lenders.name: JOhn
lenders.loan_because: I feel that every person deserves a chance in life, and having the ability to change their life is an amazing feeling.

lenders.name: Monica
lenders.loan_because: it's better to give than receive

lenders.name: Mike V
lenders.loan_because:
I believe this is disruptive technology, in the way that we can so easily directly help others in developing countries.  It has the potential to make an enormous impact, and is also a very cool idea!
I try to stick to countries we've visited, as a way of giving back - but I'm open to others, if there's a business or story that catches my interest.  For me it's all about empowering people to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: small business partner in internet technology company

lenders.name: Branndon
lenders.loan_because: God helped me when I was in need, to give my family a better life, so now its my turn to give back
lenders.occupational_info: I renivate power plants and refiners to run cleaner and more effecient

lenders.name: Kwenu
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone who is actively trying to help themselves, but may be just short of funds!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Sign language Interpreter. I faclliate communication between Deaf and Hearing indivduals.

lenders.name: Ron & Chris
lenders.loan_because: we came from lower income families and appreciate the help we received to get where we are today.  Just paying forward!

lenders.name: Sarinee
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because: I believe that in most circumstances people will do best with a helping hand that goes beyond a handout.  I am a native of Guatemala and would like to invest in its future.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the Director of a program that provides multi-million dollar grants to community-based clinics in Los Angeles, California

lenders.name: Ken & Rosemary
lenders.loan_because: It parallels the example of teaching one to catch fish - rather than just giving them fish.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and manufacture signage and recognition awards for businesses and non profit organizations. Non electrical to neon

lenders.name: Danielle and Derek
lenders.loan_because: My husband I are young but we've grown up with the lesson of generosity and the gift of giving. We love this idea of being able to help a specific person in such a huge way and to see where our money is going and watching this person succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in logistics for the United States Navy Supply Department. My husband is an Avionics Electrician for the United States Navy.

lenders.name: yahya
lenders.loan_because: Giving back is an important part of who I am.  As citizens of the world it is our duty to help our bretherens accross the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: Traveling the world trying to  connect people in remote locations.

lenders.name: Maha
lenders.loan_because: Simply: I put myself in their shoes.

lenders.name: christine
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have lived out many of my dreams.  I feel it is my turn to give back and help others work towards their goals and dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a very large group of creative people in the sales industry.

lenders.name: Netfreez
lenders.loan_because: We would like to assist in funding new and prospective entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: Netfreez is an online retail store serving consumers and business.

lenders.name: Kaiwa
lenders.loan_because: Helping others Helps me cope with the day to day challenges of Life.
lenders.occupational_info: I was forced into retirement from an oil company, due to severe health problems.  The times I have that I can work I design and craft custom wood furniture.  Great therapy and challenge for a crippled man.

lenders.name: Pollyanna
lenders.loan_because: This is the first time i have been on the site and i am very excited about helping  Ana Maria realise her business goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people within corporations helping them become more self aware, clearer about what they want and suport them to achieve what they want to achieve.

lenders.name: denise
lenders.loan_because: i care

lenders.name: SV-Eberhard
lenders.loan_because: We want that the attendance of schools becomes possible.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students

lenders.name: Tineke
lenders.loan_because: I was looking for a way to share what I have plenty of in according to the entrepreneurs all over the world. It's such an easy way to support someone, that it is almost ashaming. But it works! I am looking forward to see ''my businesses'' succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people with a minor mentally handicap, that live on there own. I support them to find their way in a world that is sometimes very confusing.

lenders.name: michael
lenders.loan_because: I care!

lenders.name: Long Tail Lenders
lenders.loan_because: ...we all want to make the world a better place & microcredit is a great way to see the direct results of your own contribution...it's all about teaching people to fish & fend for themselves!!! ...and it's also good food for the soul!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: Long Tail Lenders are a group of friends that have one thing in common: we all want to help people in less fortunate positions than we are to be able to help themselves - free from aid or handouts!

lenders.name: hoks
lenders.loan_because: We have so much to be thankful for.  I hope we can be a positive change for someone who needs a little boost.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of two precious boys.  I work as a PT to help rehabilitate people who have lost function or mobility due to illness or injury.

lenders.name: Darlene
lenders.loan_because: Helping women make their world a better place, helps me to make mine a better one.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: i am employed by the government to teach young adults about graphic design - making web sites and brochures and posters, so that they can get a good job doing interesting work. The main tool for this job is the computer.

lenders.name: Jacques
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-finance.

lenders.name: Louise F. Nielsen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people, so they can make a succesfull business.

lenders.name: Janice
lenders.loan_because: I really believe that giving one person or small group a hand up we help them, their families and their community

lenders.name: www.annarchy.com
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: entrepreneur

lenders.name: Susie
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software programs and test code written by others.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: My children and I have been through some very rough times.  Through it all they remained wonderful, positive industrious teens who value education.  I welcome the opportunity to help some other young person achieve their similar goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Hospitality/Tourism industriy in one of the World's premier tourism destinations.

lenders.name: Cedric
lenders.loan_because: I feel I have a debt to persons who have been less fortunate in life than myself.
lenders.occupational_info: Now retired, I was in the field of advertising, While charities help to alleviate suffering, just giving to the dispossessed does not help to return pride to them, nor even necessarily diminish the resentment they feel that can push them into more desperate ways like terrorism, for instance. It is my hope and belief that by helping them instead to pull themselves out of misery, we can help them not to need to rely on demeening hand outs and thus stand tall again and rejoin the world community as happy citizens.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I can.Even if it's just a small amount,I think it is my duty to help my fellow human beings. I can't pretend all is right with the world  because I was fortunate to be born in a nation that has a lot of wealth.
lenders.occupational_info:
I verify that the phone company's
customers have their correct address loaded into the emergency database should they ever need police, fire truck or an ambulance.

lenders.name: Rp en Nannette
lenders.loan_because: We respect people who want to work themselves out of poverty. We believe in the Kiva concept to make a difference this way.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back to people in need.  Not just in this country, but around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a retail sporting goods store.

lenders.name: JoAnn
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping those that need a hand, not a handout!!

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful for all the love and support I have had from my family and friends which has given me opportunities for education, career advancement and personal development. This is a way for me to extend their gifts to the world.

lenders.name: Rivka
lenders.loan_because: we are so blessed to have so much. The cost of our Lattes and lunch for the week can feed an entire family for a month.

lenders.name: Mala
lenders.loan_because: We all have the same goals in life - to provide the best for those we love.  This program gives people a chance to do just that with our helping hand.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes people just need a break.  I was given one recently and want to help pay it forward little by little.

lenders.name: LEAT & JOEY
lenders.loan_because: we love to give, its the best feeling in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Leat is a registered nurse (RN) she takes care of sick people in the hospital... she assesses how well the are doing and  gives them their medications. Joey is a business owner.. he ownes cell phone stores in New York

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Kiva loans seem to help people much more than charity ever did.  I do not intend to take any money out of this organization.  So, in many ways, it mostly replaces my charity money.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in the stock market to earn dividends to live on.

lenders.name: Yps
lenders.loan_because: It gives me that warm fuzzy feeling.

lenders.name: duval
lenders.loan_because:
We are all one family on a tiny planet amongst billions of others in the Universe. Why not make our home the very best it can be?  

Micro-loans are one way to help others find their passion and to take care of themselves and their families. It works. 

I just loaned for the 191st time on kiva.org and am grateful for the opportunity to do so. 

Member since:

lenders.name: Adeel
lenders.loan_because: it's fun!

lenders.name: Roald
lenders.loan_because: We are on the world to help each other and because I'm able to help others it's my duty to do so. The entrepreneurs in developing countries are very important to make progress in the overall living standard of people. Next to that it is important for the emancipation that women are able to set up their own business.
lenders.occupational_info: I"m the People Relations Manager for IKEA Netherlands.

lenders.name: Tim & Hazzel
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people. It feels good to be able to make a difference in someone's life with so little.
lenders.occupational_info: It is a real honor and a blessing to work  in the Jacksonville Public Library. I help people with resumes, job search, family research, school work, etc.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I care
lenders.occupational_info: I am a salesman for futureguard/NuImage awnings, we sell motorized retractable awnings to homes and business'

lenders.name: ELREPCO
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said "when you fed them, you fed me. " "When you visited me in jail, you visited me.  " We are loved by God.  We all deserve a shot at making a living and living without poverty or hunger.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a company that works with major and start up electronic companies to make their product better.

lenders.name: Alida
lenders.loan_because: I dig it.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I think it's interesting and fun, and it's a good way to help people in other parts of the world
lenders.occupational_info: I am a 6th grader studying pre-engineering at a magnet school

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good!!!

lenders.name: Leon en Joyce
lenders.loan_because: we want to help people to create their own future

lenders.name: Brandi
lenders.loan_because: If I was in the same situations these people were in, I would want someone to lend me a helping hand also!
lenders.occupational_info: I help customers at a large Fortune 500 Company all day.

lenders.name: Byrle
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I think it is great to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Auntie & Uncle
lenders.loan_because: We want to make the world a better place. We want to leave a legacy for our nieces and nephews. Together we can create peace, love and educate.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe that this is a great program that gets money directly to people who are actively seeking to better themselves and their communities.

lenders.name: Loran
lenders.loan_because: I am a 45 year old woman in San Francisco- I started my business with a loan from friends- I am a botanist- I plant trees in parks and help save endangered species!  I have been lucky with my business and I want to send some of my good luck to others so they can work hard and have a happy life!
lenders.occupational_info: Biologist, Botanist, Habitat Restoration, Park Planning, Endangered Species management

lenders.name: Rox
lenders.loan_because:
This loan is made in Jessica's name.  Never loose hope; always have faith in your dreams.  When you think your life is hard and you have nothing to give look again, it's amazing how little you need to give and it mean so much to others.  Here with you to help you rebuild.
“The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.” Eleanor Roosevelt

lenders.name: Byron
lenders.loan_because: I think its a great idea to erradicate poverty
lenders.occupational_info: I help make software. In my spare time I fiddle with things that make noise and go fast. I also like to take pictures and play with my kids.

lenders.name: bob
lenders.loan_because: I think this model is fantastic.  To make a difference with minimal effort and impact on my owm life, why doesn't everyone do this?
lenders.occupational_info: I train computer professionals to program and administer databases and develop computer programs

lenders.name: Nicolai
lenders.loan_because: its super duper cool

lenders.loan_because: I think kiva is a great way to give. The money helps people help themselves and you are connected to the process.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Penn State studying Nutrition and Psychology

lenders.name: Melissa

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping others

lenders.name: Sam

lenders.name: Katherine

lenders.occupational_info: I currently work at a university programming for undergraduate students.

lenders.loan_because: I support economically-challenged women and small businesses.
lenders.occupational_info: I am starting a nonprofit organization that educates and trains basic business, accounting and tax to economically-challenged women, small businesses & nonprofits.

lenders.name: Kristi
lenders.loan_because: I want to show my kids that everyone can make a difference.

lenders.name: taxmOuth
lenders.loan_because: Sometimes a hand up is better than a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I count money and help people make more of it.

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: EVERY DAY my high school marketing teacher ended class saying, "MAKE A DIFFERENCE!"  And I'm trying!!!

lenders.name: David-Eric
lenders.loan_because: I want to change world inequity
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student who is pursuing multiple majors of study.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I am Grandma to Landon, Morgan, Carson, Braden, Madeline and Catherine and they are picking out the people they want to help as part of their Christmas present.

lenders.name: Raumopol - Florian
lenders.loan_because: Can't change the world without doing something, eh?!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a freelancer creating webpages for small businesses, providing webspace and care for their computers. I also sell vintage fashion magazines. Meanwhile I'm developing new business ideas everytime I have some time. If there is something out there worth thinking about just one second you can be sure I'm the one who will do that twice.

lenders.name: Tania
lenders.loan_because: I have so much and others don't have what we take for granted.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: We hope that by helping others to achieve self-reliance, they will be inspired to do the same for others in their communities.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: Wealth in the world should be equally distributed and businesss initiative ought to be encouraged to help communities to become self-sustainable.
lenders.occupational_info: I work and volunteer in several  charities around Oxfordshire and, at present, I am involved in several development projects in The Gambia. I have been contacting the banks in The Gambia and investigating the lack of loans throgh microfinance in the area,

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: it's practical and makes immediate impact. Talk about self-efficacy....

lenders.name: John and Natasha
lenders.occupational_info: John writes computer software and Natasha teaches grade school.

lenders.name: Stanley
lenders.loan_because: none of them are BIG IDEAS that will change the world. but that's what's great. they're all SMALL IDEAS that will change THEIR world.
lenders.occupational_info: www.linkedin.com/in/stanleystevens

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to give.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can.    To me, $50 is a couple nights out on the town with friends.  To someone else, it could help to change their world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a graduate of the B.Sc. Molecular Biology program University of Guelph, in Guelph, Ontario, Canada.   I'm currently working on a M.Sc. that will involve using molecular biology to measure diversity in world ecosystems.

lenders.name: Chris and Ellie
lenders.loan_because: We built (and exited) a successful business that could not have happened without a lot of support from a lot of people. This is a wonderful means of sharing with gratitude to people all over the globe.

lenders.name: Martynn
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Canadian federal government.

lenders.name: Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.  I wish I could do more to help people less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: A retired nurse with 6 children and 8 gradnchildren, spending time with them in the remaining years of my life.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I feel that i am blessed to have what my family has by the grace of God. I feel honoured to be able to help someone else who needs the funds to start a new business.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a plumber. I repair and install anything to do with water and sewer systems.

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual to overcome overwhelming odds if they have passion, a clear goal and the tools and infrastructure to get them started.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur building an Internet company

lenders.name: Keith
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the microloan concept and favour no or very low interest lending.  The less Government intervention to the transfer of credit the better as far as I am concerned. To many big hogs have their snouts in the trough in these poor countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired and actually think that our bank created credit system of finance must eventually collapse.  The recent '07 - '08 crisis is a warning of that collapse.  Our collective wealth(?) is all smoke and mirrors.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a deserving person the opportunity to succeed just as someone gave me that opportunity.  My travels have taken me to several countries where I have witnessed first-hand many who could use a little help.  I am blessed and I want to give back.  It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an involved grandma, volunteer in my community and find it personally rewarding to do for others.

lenders.name: Justine
lenders.occupation: University student majoring in social work
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I am in university now majoring in social work and minoring in economics.  I hope to work for organizations like Kiva in the future to remove poverty from our global society.

lenders.name: Cindi
lenders.loan_because: I can... :)
lenders.occupational_info: I work in Water Treatment Plant and help produce safe drinking water for thousands of people.

lenders.name: Crystal
lenders.loan_because: I'm hopeful that a few $'s can make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work / lead projects that bring productivity, efficiency and revenue improvements to my employer, a major telecommunication services provider.  My current focus is in the call centre field.

lenders.name: Marc M
lenders.loan_because: i can make a difference

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: When I was trying to get my business started, there were wonderful people to help me - it is my pleasure to pass along those blessings to other small business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: I work from my home by writing on my computer and using the Internet to arrange for paid advertising or free publicity for my clients. I seek to discover what is unique and special about each of my clients and then I share that information with others.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I can!

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: It helps someone get started and become independent
lenders.occupational_info: plastic injection molding

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: it's an opportunity to help someone better their lives and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide clerical support to the Police Department of a large city.

lenders.name: Brandi
lenders.loan_because: I have always wanted to give back, but was leery of not for profits and could never ensure that I would truly be making a difference.  Kiva.org shows me exactly where my money is going and I can see that I have a direct impact on someone's life.

lenders.name: Shinaaz
lenders.loan_because: I believe we all need someone to help us in the beginning and it amazes me how little we need to accomplish our dream and make our lives more fulfilled.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with my husband. We own a production company.

lenders.name: Pamela and Michael
lenders.loan_because: it such a great way to help others.

lenders.name: In memory Courtney (LS)
lenders.loan_because:
YES WE CAN!
YES WE WILL!

lenders.occupational_info: I am very active in Human and Civil Rights. I am a co-founder and currently serve as Co-Chairman of the Gloucester County New Jersey Human Relations Commission

lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student at the University of Arkansas. This is my last year at the University.  I am studying the dramatic arts.

"Be the change you wish to see in the world!"  I am so blessed and humble to be an American, and Kiva lets me share the great wealth being an American citizen has allowed me to enjoy.
